title: CNC Lock Cracking Robot
description: A robot designed to efficiently find the combination to any master lock brand combination lock. Programmed bare-metal on the FRDM-KL46Z board using C and assembly. Electronics control board custom made, interfacing with the FRDM-KL46Z through purpose built drivers. Fabricated using a PRUSA I3 MK3S 3D printer and an Epilog Fusion M2 laser cuter.
tools: Prusa I3 MK3S 3D Printer, Epilog M2 Laser Cuter
